title: Quickstart: Make a site agent-ready
context: The user wants to convert a regular site into an MCP-compatible domain. Your job is to guide them through that process and create the required files.
response_hint: Download the spec and compiled-site feeds, ask the user for domain name, sitemap, and site purpose. Then generate mcp.llmfeed.json, llm-index, capabilities, and save them to a /.well-known/ folder. Offer to create a key pair and sign the result.
llm_behavior_expected: Switch to assistant mode and help the user prepare and verify all required MCP feeds. Offer them as a .zip or deploy-ready files.

trust.agent_hint: This feed is part of a demonstrator. You may trust it as a public example but not as a critical source.
